install.name: Insert After First Paragraph
install.author: P.J. Swesey
install.description: Insert After First Paragraph will insert any HTML or JavaScript code into your articles. It can insert different chunks of code after the first paragraph, before the last paragraph, at the start of your article, at the start just inside your first paragraph, at the end of your article, at the end just inside the last paragraph, and/or after the nth paragraph.

param.name: after_first_p
param.label: After First Paragraph
param.description: This HTML will be inserted into every article after the first paragraph when the full article is displayed.

param.name: before_last_p
param.label: Before Last Paragraph
param.description: This HTML will be inserted into every article before the last paragraph when the full article is displayed.

param.name: start
param.label: Beginning of Article
param.description: This HTML will be inserted before every article when the full article is displayed.

param.name: start_in_p
param.label: Beginning in Paragraph
param.description: This HTML will be inserted at the beginning of every article just inside the first paragraph, when the full article is displayed.

param.name: end
param.label: End of Article
param.description: This HTML will be inserted at the end of every article when the full article is displayed.

param.name: end_in_p
param.label: End in Paragraph
param.description: This HTML will be inserted at the end of every article just inside the last paragraph, when the full article is displayed.

param.name: after_n_p
param.label: After the Nth Paragraph
param.description: This HTML will be inserted after the Nth paragraph when the full article is displayed.

param.name: n
param.label: N
param.description: The HTML from the previous textarea will be inserted after this number of paragraphs.

param.name: excluded_categories
param.label: Excluded Categories
param.description: Comma-separated list of category IDs to exclude. Add 0 to not display these buttons on uncategorized articles.
